name: Super Space Survivor
description:
UPDATE: I made a mistake and accidentally clicked the linux check instead of the Windows check. The file does have Winx86 in the name but still I have changed the check. Also, please play the game in 1920x1080.

=====================================

My very first game! It's not the greatest but it's mine!

Music credits go to OC Remix:

ProtoVaffe - Mustin

Charge! Towards the Sunset of Intergalactic Dictatorship - HeavenWraith

Brainsick Metal - Protricity
